 - Can be used individually or together
 - For a great eye look
 - Easy to apply
 - Vegan

The alverde NATURKOSMETIK Eyeshadow Palette Quattro 37 Chocolate gives your eyes a natural to dramatically accentuated look. With the colour-coordinated eyeshadows and the included eyeshadow applicator, you can create your own look, whether used individually or together. In addition, the range of eye and contact lens compatibility has been confirmed by an ophthalmologist. Formulated without microplastics and water-soluble purely synthetic polymers.

Usage
Naturally made-up eyes in just a few steps. 
Step 1: Apply the lightest shade under the eyebrow as a highlighter. 
Step 2: Spread the darker shade over the movable eyelid and blend out the eyeshadow colour with the slightly lighter shade facing upwards. 
Step 3: Place the darkest shade on the crease of the eyelid and pull it outwards.

 - Can be used individually or together
 - For a great eye look
 - Easy to apply
 - Vegan

The alverde NATURKOSMETIK Eyeshadow Palette Quattro 50 Rose Garden gives your eyes a natural to dramatically accentuated look. With the colour-coordinated eyeshadows and the included eyeshadow applicator, you can create your own look, whether used individually or together. In addition, the range of eye and contact lens compatibility has been confirmed by an ophthalmologist. Formulated without microplastics and water-soluble purely synthetic polymers.

Usage
Naturally made-up eyes in just a few steps. 
Step 1: Apply the lightest shade under the eyebrow as a highlighter. 
Step 2: Spread the darker shade over the movable eyelid and blend out the eyeshadow colour with the slightly lighter shade facing upwards. 
Step 3: Place the darkest shade on the crease of the eyelid and pull it outwards.

name: ORGANIC ALOE VERA PURE GEL
certification_description: At least 95% of natural and/or derived natural ingredients, where applicable, stem from organic agriculture or controlled harvesting of wild plants.
ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis leaf extract*, Xanthan gum, Algin, Glycerin, Benzyl alcohol, Salicylic acid, Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid.
     * From Organic farming

ALOE VERA PURE GEL intensively moisturizes, nourishes and protects the skin, leaving it soft, fresh and balanced. It is ideal to fight the signs of aging and skin irritation even after long exposure to the sun. 

ALOE VERA PURE GEL is an innovative product made with 100% organic pure aloe gel, organically grown from fresh leaves of Aloe Vera Barbadensis and obtained by cold extraction. The extraordinary quality of the Aloe Vera pure gel allows you to use this product for several uses, thanks to the well known beneficial properties of Aloe Vera.

ALOE VERA PURE GEL is an intensive protection treatment for the skin. Its precious properties make this gel a suitable product for all skin types in case of dry skin, reddened skin, irritated skin due to the regenerating effect on dry and damaged skin. The richness of the gel is particularly appreciated on reddened skin, giving a soothing, purifying and refreshing effect to the skin. Thanks to its purity it allows you to moisturize, soften and soothe the skin, leaving a pleasant sensation of freshness and a young, silky and smooth skin. 

ALOE VERA PURE GEL does not grease and is quickly absorbed by the skin thanks to its light and delicate texture. Apply a generous amount of ALOE VERA PURE GEL on the skin and massage it gently until completely absorbed.

Antiage Day & Night Cream
Fresh and light cream with an immediate antiage effect. Lifting effect. It recovers the balance and contributes to the skin luminosity helping to combat effectively skin aging. It develops a powerful anti-wrinkle action while revitalizing tired and aged skin leaving them compact (natural filler). 
Suitable for all types of skins. 

Main Active Ingredients:
- Aloe Vera y Hyaluronic acid (100% pure).
- Aloe Vera Barbadensis: Decongestant, protective and nutritive.
- Hyaluronic acid: Moisturizes, nourishes and softens tired areas of the skin.
- Mica: Texturizing agent. Skin conditioner. Opacifier.
- Titanium Dioxide: Opacifying, texturizing.
- Almond Oil - Jojoba Oil - Grenade Seed Oil.

 - Can be used individually or together
 - For a great eye look
 - Easy to apply
 - Vegan

The alverde NATURKOSMETIK Eyeshadow Palette Quattro 37 Chocolate gives your eyes a natural to dramatically accentuated look. With the colour-coordinated eyeshadows and the included eyeshadow applicator, you can create your own look, whether used individually or together. In addition, the range of eye and contact lens compatibility has been confirmed by an ophthalmologist. Formulated without microplastics and water-soluble purely synthetic polymers.

Usage
Naturally made-up eyes in just a few steps. 
Step 1: Apply the lightest shade under the eyebrow as a highlighter. 
Step 2: Spread the darker shade over the movable eyelid and blend out the eyeshadow colour with the slightly lighter shade facing upwards. 
Step 3: Place the darkest shade on the crease of the eyelid and pull it outwards.

 - Can be used individually or together
 - For a great eye look
 - Easy to apply
 - Vegan

The alverde NATURKOSMETIK Eyeshadow Palette Quattro 50 Rose Garden gives your eyes a natural to dramatically accentuated look. With the colour-coordinated eyeshadows and the included eyeshadow applicator, you can create your own look, whether used individually or together. In addition, the range of eye and contact lens compatibility has been confirmed by an ophthalmologist. Formulated without microplastics and water-soluble purely synthetic polymers.

Usage
Naturally made-up eyes in just a few steps. 
Step 1: Apply the lightest shade under the eyebrow as a highlighter. 
Step 2: Spread the darker shade over the movable eyelid and blend out the eyeshadow colour with the slightly lighter shade facing upwards. 
Step 3: Place the darkest shade on the crease of the eyelid and pull it outwards.

certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
AQUA, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, ALCOHOL, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, DISODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, PECTIN, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, SODIUM LEVULINATE, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, SALICYLIC ACID, TOCOPHEROL, TRIETHYL CITRATE, SODIUM ANISATE, CHONDRUS CRISPUS POWDER, HUMULUS LUPULUS EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, GELLAN GUM, MENTHA ARVENSIS HERB OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, GENTIANA LUTEA ROOT EXTRACT, LEPTOSPERMUM SCOPARIUM BRANCH/ LEAF OIL

Usage
The VELAN PURE & CLEAR Wash Lotion offers gentle cleansing and care of impure, oily and acne-prone facial skin with purely natural active ingredients. It is also suitable for rosacea and seborrheic eczema.

 - antibacterial and anti-inflammatory effect
 - Cleanses thoroughly without drying out
 - Manuka and hops reduce sebum formation and clarify and refresh the complexion
 - Herbal bitter substances from the yellow gentian strengthen the skin barrier (patented principle of action)
 - Field mint has a cooling, refreshing and itching-relieving effect
 - with vitamin E and jojoba oil

Usage
Apply evenly to damp facial skin and distribute gently. Avoid the eye area. After three to five minutes, wash off thoroughly with lukewarm water.

product_description:
The agwa super clean dent Microsilber-Repair toothpaste with zeolite serves as an optimal support for the regeneration of your tooth enamel.

The natural mineral complex with hydroxyapatite and calcium promotes remineralization and thus provides ideal protection against tooth decay.

In addition, the power of the anti-cariogenic xylitol has a reinforcing effect in the direction of caries protection.

The soothing and anti-inflammatory effects of aloe and turmeric round off dental care in a completely natural way.

Long-lasting protection against bacteria and dental plaque is provided by the proven technology with microsilver, which protects your teeth for up to 14 hours after brushing.

The agwa super clean dent repair formula thus optimally supports stressed tooth enamel and restores its natural strength and resistance.

name: ANTIOXIDANTIEN SERUM
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Aqua, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Water, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaine, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Cannabis Sativa Seed Extract, Sodium Polyglutamate, Anthyllis Vulneraria Flower Extract, Trehalose, Ectoin, Stevioside, Acacia Senegal Gum, Hydrolyzed Rhizobian Gum, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid.* 
      * without parfum and essential oils.

Main ingredients
Pomegranate Extract, Green Tea Extract, Vegan Hyaluronic Acid & Polyglutamic Acid, Hemp Seed Extract, Kidney Vetch Flower Extract, Vegan Glycerine.
product_description:
Antioxidant face care, with anti-aging effect, that boosts and moisturises.

The STUDIO BOTANIC ANTIOXIDANT SERUM not only has an antioxidant effect, but also revitalises and firms your face. The particularly vitalizing formulation of pomegranate extract, green tea extract, hemp extract, kidney vetch extract and vegan glycerine provides an antioxidant boost, strengthens the skin barrier and counteracts skin irritations. It also supports natural regeneration and preserves the skin’s moisture in the long term. The serum gives the face a radiant, youthful complexion and creates a sustainably nourished, firm skin feeling.

The ANTIOXIDANT SERUM has a high concentration of long, medium and short-chain vegan hyaluronic acids, which can optimally reach the upper, middle and lower layers of the skin. Added to this is vegan polyglutamic acid, which is many times more effective than long-chain hyaluronic acid. This leads to an optimal boosting effect in the upper skin layer. This replenishes your skin’s moisture depots and forms an optimal basis for your daily care routine, both in the morning and in the evening. Volume, elasticity and firmness of the skin are improved in the long term.

Another advantage: it does not contain any additional fragrance from essential oils or perfumes. Only the scent of the green tea extract is slightly perceptible, but it quickly disappears after application. Due to the nature of its extracts, the color of the serum varies in shades of yellow. The serum may darken slightly over time.

Its benefits include regenerating and softening properties, strengthening the natural elasticity of the skin and a soothing effect. A proportion of Fair Trade Organic Shea Butter provides the skin with important vitamins D, F, A and E to help protect it from unwanted environmental influences.

name: ORGANIC CALENDULA ZINC OINTMENT
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil*, Zinc Oxide, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil*, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Sweet Oil*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract*, Tocopherol, Linalool**
     * From controlled organic farming.
    ** Natural part of the macerate
product_description:
Organic calendula zinc ointment is based on the traditional zinc ointment used by our grandmothers when they needed help with the protection and care of sensitive skin. Organic Marigold Zinc Ointment from Purity Vision provides soothing care for stressed skin. The ointment soothes the skin, slightly dries it, cools it pleasantly and with regular use helps to provide the necessary protection. The ointment is suitable for the care of skin prone to diaper rash and eczematous skin. It is especially appreciated by the sensitive skin of our little ones.

The ointment is made by the traditional method of slow maceration of herbs. The largest representation in the ointment is the macerate of calendula, which Purity Vision grows themselves in South Moravia. Marigold flowers are pickled in cold-pressed organic sunflower oil for several weeks. The soothing power and valuable effects of calendula are thus transferred to the macerate in an undiminished degree.

Zinc ointment also boasts macerates of lavender, chamomile and vanilla. Among the greatest advantages of lavender and chamomile macerate are its soothing properties, thanks to which the ointment gently cares for even very sensitive children's skin. Vanilla macerate not only gives the skin a beautiful scent, but also beneficial and effective substances that help the skin maintain a fresh appearance.

product_description:
The STUDIO BOTANIC CLARIFYING FACE TONER is a gentle, caring and clearing facial cleanser, for impure, oily and combination skin, but can also be used for normal skin. The particularly clarifying formulation of green tea extract, hemp extract, witch hazel extract, kidney vetch extract, capuchin cress extract, vegan glycerin as also neroli water, cucumber water and peppermint water, reduces skin impurities and regulates the complexion. The toner gives the face a radiant complexion and creates a lasting nourished skin feeling.

Another advantage: It does not contain any perfumes. Only the scent of green tea, neroli, cucumber and peppermint creates a very fresh composition, which evaporates after application.

Due to the nature of its extracts, the color of the toner varies in shades of orange. The toner may darken slightly over time.
usage:
Our STUDIO BOTANIC CLARIFYING FACE TONER is suitable for both day and night care. You can also use it at any time as needed. Simply spray 2-3 times on cleansed face and massage – on the left and right side of the face and on the forehead.

In addition, it can also be used on a cotton pad in your facial cleansing routine.

Our Glow by Nature Serum revives your complexion for improved firmness and beautifully radiant skin. The highly effective formula with natural coenzyme Q10 and natural vitamin C reduces free radicals and thus protects against oxidative stress. The wonderfully light moisturising texture absorbs quickly and gently melts into the skin for a healthy-looking, radiant complexion.

- Anti-fatigue effect
- For a smooth and radiant complexion

product_description:
A two-week vitamin A-like treatment that targets signs of ageing by helping to improve the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, dullness, dryness and elasticity. 85% saw an improvement in skin smoothness1 .

Rejuvenate and target ageing concerns with 4% bakuchiol, a potent natural retinol alternative without the irritating side-effects. This concentrated formulation also includes ultra-hydrating plant squalane, omega-rich hemp and rosehip oils and softening meadowfoam oil. It's a powerful daily booster treatment to improve the appearance of fine lines, dullness and dryness, leaving skin looking radiantly youthful. 

Suitable for all skin types, especially those with rapid ageing concerns. Safe to use during pregnancy.
usage: Gently massage 3-4 drops into clean skin for 2 weeks and follow with your favourite serum &/or and moisturiser. For best results, use morning and evening consecutively for two weeks or until finished. This treatment can also be used as an everyday addition to your skincare routine.

product_description:
Regenerating face care that moisturises and is quickly absorbed.

The STUDIO BOTANIC FACE CREAM is light, easy to apply and provides your skin day and night with many valuable ingredients. At the same time, it has an antioxidant, regenerating effect and can even smooth small wrinkles.
 
Thanks to the combination of high-quality hemp, jojoba and olive oil as well as vegan wax, the cream quickly absorbs and intensively moisturises without being greasy. The oils and waxes also protect your skin from drying out and ensure an even skin texture. Passioline, which is extracted from native passion fruit oil, has a special regenerative effect on the skin. Green tea extract provides an antioxidant boost.
 
So your skin is sustainably cared for all day long, without shining. Even at night, the STUDIO BOTANIC FACE CREAM is an effective companion and helps your skin to regenerate.

Vitalising neroli oil and green tea extract gives the cream a very subtle fragrance. This is a low, natural fragrance that quickly disappears after application. In its pure naturalness, the original scent is reduced over time.
usage:
Our STUDIO BOTANIC FACE CREAM is suitable for both day and night care.

Due to its special formulation, it can be spread very well on the skin, absorbs quickly and does not greasy.
It unfolds its full effect when you apply a hazelnut-sized amount (approx. 1 ml) to the cleansed and dried face and gently massage it in.

The perfect complement to every beauty kit. This pure plant all-in-one make-up removing oil transforms to cleansing milk when combined with water to remove even the most stubborn make-up and grime (including waterproof mascara and long wear foundation).

Provides a thorough cleanse without stripping moisture and is very gentle around the eyes. Pure plant oils - rosehip, sweet almond and grapeseed nourish and cleanse, while papaya extract and sunflower oil refresh. Skin is left feeling soft, hydrated and perfectly clean.

For those that are a fan of the double cleanse, use this as your first step at night and simply repeat, or follow with one of our cream or gel cleansers.
usage: Gently massage 3-4 pumps onto palm of hand. Smooth over dry face, neck and décolletage using circular motions. Using hands, add a little water, emulsify and continue with circular motions as desired. Thoroughly rinse away with warm water, using a face cloth if needed. Pat dry.

name: ROSE BUTTER
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.

product_description:
Organic Rose Butter offers a royal treatment that is designed for all skin types. it is an excellent helper in the care of dry and mature skin, leaving it nourished and silky soft. The benefits of the butter include regenerating properties, strengthening the natural elasticity of the skin and smoothing out fine lines.

The proportion of vitamins A, F, D and E protects the skin and the skin from the effects of adverse external influences, thus the butter supports the anti-aging effect. Thanks to its nourishing properties, you will love it especially as a nourishing lip balm, skin cream or body lotion.

The butter is made using the traditional method of slow maceration from the Damascus rose, which grows in the pink valley of the Bulgarian mountains. The harvesting of the flowers begins in the early morning, when the greatest amount of essential oils are produced in the flower. The harvested flowers are immediately transported for processing, ensuring maximum freshness and freshness. During processing, the rosebuds are embedded in high-quality PURITY VISION® Organic Shea Butter for several weeks. Their soothing power and intense aroma are thus transferred to the macerate in undiminished measure. Enjoy the tender care created by nature itself.

name: LAVENDER BUTTER
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Linalool**. 
      * From controlled organic farming.
    ** A natural component of macerate and essential oil.
product_description:
Organic Lavender Butter offers gentle care that is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive baby skin. It helps to soothe irritation, so it is also suitable for problematic skin.

Organic Lavender Butter is made by the traditional method of gradual maceration from lavender (lavandula angustifolia), which grows in the pink valley of the Bulgarian mountains. The collection of the small flowers begins in the early morning, when the greatest amount of essential oils is produced in the flower. The harvested flowers are immediately transported for processing, ensuring maximum freshness and freshness. During processing, the lavender blossom sprigs are marinated in PURITY VISION® Organic Fair Trade Shea Butter for several weeks. Their soothing power and intense fragrance are thus transferred to the macerate in undiminished measure. Enjoy the tender care created by nature itself.

You'll love it especially for its soothing scent and versatile use. It is excellent as a nourishing body butter, protective cream or softening lip balm. thanks to the content of Fair Trade Organic Shea Butter, it provides the skin with vitamins D, F, A and E, which deeply nourish the skin and leave it velvety soft.

product_description: The unique combination of seven caring Bio oils with plant extracts is suitable for daily care of all skin types. Bio Lavender renewing oil is especially loved by problematic, acne-prone and eczematous skin for its regenerative abilities. Those who are sensitive will appreciate the soothing properties of medicinal lavender.

name: LAVENDER LIP OIL
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil*, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil*, Sesamum Indicum Seed Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower, Lecithin, Candelilla Cera, Tocopherol, Linalool**

product_description:
Bio Lavender Lip Oil perfectly protects, nourishes and cares for chapped lips. Your lips will be silky soft and simply kissable. The fragrant macerate of lavender together with caring oils provides soothing and regenerating care for the lips. The oil creates a soft protective layer on the lips that nourishes, protects against cracking and leaves them velvety soft and shiny.

Regular use of lip oil can easily prevent the drying and chapping of the lips that we are all familiar with in various weather conditions. With each rubbing, you will be reminded of the scent of sensual lavender fields thanks to the intoxicating lavender scent.

The main caring ingredients include Candelilla wax, which creates a soft film on the surface of the lips that protects them in the long term, prevents drying and cracking. Macerate of Lavender. During processing, the lavender flowers are marinated in a mixture of cold-pressed oils for several weeks. This high quality blend consists of Bio Sunflower, Bio Raw Argan and Bio Jojoba oils. The soothing power and pleasant aroma of lavender is thus transferred to the macerate in undiminished measure. It also contains a large amount of nourishing oils, such as 100% Organic Castor Oil, 100% Raw Organic Argan Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil or Sesame Oil.

product_description:
Bio Rose oil brings vitalizing care for all skin types. Due to its regenerative abilities, it is the perfect choice for mature and dry skin. It will supply it with the necessary nutrients that protect it from drying out and premature aging.

Pamper yourself with the care of royal abbots in the form of high-quality cosmetic oil, which you can use for make-up removal, aromatherapy, a relaxing massage or a scented bath.

Bio Rose oil is made using the traditional method of slow maceration, during which the buds of the rare damask rose (Rosa damascena) are loaded with a mixture of cold-pressed oils for several weeks. This high-quality blend consists of organic sunflower, jojoba and argan oil. During this time, valuable properties and the intoxicating aroma of the rose, which we harvest from the virgin nature of the Bulgarian Amarok mountains, pass into the macerate. Thanks to its 100% pure and natural origin, rose macerate ensures a radiant and fresh appearance to the skin.

     * From controlled organic farming.
product_description:
Pamper yourself with a regenerating cream with the enchanting scent of rose and vanilla. The purely natural formula provides all skin types with intensive regeneration and helps fight skin aging. Thanks to the practical packaging, the cream will find a place in your handbag and will be your companion on your daily travels.

The main ingredient of the cream is macerate in BIO Shea butter, which creates a unique scent and gives the cream a nourishing effect.

PURITY VISION® Organic Shea Butter is versatile, highly nourishing, caring, full of vitamins and minerals. It is an essential ingredient in cosmetic products and is used in spas and beauty salons for the most demanding clients. It comes from pure areas of East Africa, from the fruit of a lesser known and less accessible species of African butter tree (Vitellaria Nilotica). It therefore contains much more beneficial substances than the commonly available shea butters. It dissolves at body temperature, making it easily and quickly absorbed into the skin. You will appreciate it especially for its moisturizing and regenerating effects. 

Rose of Damascus macerate is known for its rejuvenating effects and gives the cream a unique floral scent. Vanilla macerate has not only a unique sweet scent but also soothing properties. The combination of Raw Bio Argan, Bio Jojoba, Bio Borage and Vitamin E oils gives the cream unique nurturing properties.

product_description:
Bio Lavender Hyaluronic Serum combines salicylic acid, zinc, aloe vera and blackcurrant extract so you can enjoy even more soothing effects. Hyaluronic serum is suitable for normal and mixed skin, but acneic and problematic skin will also appreciate it. The serum penetrates deeply, hydrates and nourishes the skin. Hyaluronic acid provides the skin with effective regeneration and protects it from external influences. Salicylic acid and zinc tighten pores and prevent clogging. Blackcurrant contains a large amount of vitamin C, which acts against oxidative stress, thus slowing down the aging of cells.

Thanks to the combination of these unique natural substances, you can treat your skin to the best care. We recommend applying Bio Lavender Hyaluronic Serum before using your favorite cream or skin oil from the PURITY VISION line. This will provide the skin with an extra portion of hydration and achieve a charming, radiant appearance.

The contained Echinacea extract harmonizes reddened skin and regenerates acne scars. Salicylic acid penetrates deep into the skin and helps unclog clogged pores. Bio Lavender tonic contributes to the natural function of the skin, including optimal sebum production.

You will also love the organic lavender tonic as a base layer under your favorite cream or oil from the PURITY VISION line. In addition, the gentle lavender scent will accompany you throughout the day.

product_description:
Bio Chamomile Water offers gentle care suitable for all skin types. Thanks to its ability to regulate the production of sebum, Bio Chamomile Water is suitable for the care of problematic and sensitive skin. Its benefits include brightening effects, balancing the PH of the skin, soothing effect and reducing swelling, itching and redness from the sun or insects. At the same time, it works as a tonic that will provide the necessary hydration and relaxation. It is popular for its versatile use and delicate fragrance. With its gentle and soothing properties, even the delicate skin of babies will appreciate its effects.

Chamomile fragrance is typical for its bittersweet honey undertones. It is known from folk traditions that the universal abilities of chamomile harmonize body and mind.

Bio Chamomile Water is packaged in a practical spray bottle that you can carry with you and, if necessary, spray on your face to refresh or fix your makeup during the day.

product_description:
Bio lemon balm water offers natural soothing and moisturizing care suitable for all skin types. You will appreciate its effects especially when taking care of acne, eczema and sensitive skin. Thanks to its ability to regulate the production of sebum, it is ideal for oily and mixed skin, which it harmonizes and restores balance. It provides hydration to the skin, regenerates it, turns it off and smoothes it. Therefore, we also recommend it for the care of mild irritations, for example from the sun or after insect bites. In these cases, it will help reduce skin redness and swelling.

Lemon balm has a pleasant refreshing lemon scent with relaxing effects. Folk traditions are known to relax the mind from feelings of anxiety and stress and induce a good mood.

Organic Lemon balm water is produced by gentle steam distillation of medicinal lemon balm leaves grown in the virgin nature of the Bulgarian mountains. To produce 1 liter of this flower water, you need to collect approximately 1 kg of fresh petals. Thanks to the gentle processing by traditional double steam distillation, most of the active substances and valuable properties of this soothing herb are preserved in the final product. No additives, alcohol, stabilizers or preservatives are added to Bio Melon Water.

certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients: Moroccan Lava Clay.
product_description:
Moroccan Rhassoul clay is suitable for all skin types, especially for problematic skin prone to eczema and acne. Rhassoul provides the skin with beneficial minerals such as phosphorus, calcium, sodium and ferrous manganese. Thanks to this, it excels in its ability to absorb toxins and impurities.

Moroccan women have been loving Rhassoul for this characteristic since the 6th century. centuries n.l.when they used it to perform cleansing procedures. Its other benefits include strengthening the skin's natural resistance, slowing down the aging process and reducing blackheads. 

Moroccan clay, also known as Rhassoul or Ghassoul, is a very fine soil that is mined in the northeast of Morocco. We have been importing it from this area for years.

Baby’s Bliss is a blend of the purest natural botanical extracts and almond oil to protect and nourish your baby’s skin. It may improve stratum corneum hydration. Baby’s Bliss improves blood circulation, relaxes tense muscles, and soothes tired limbs.
usage: Warm up the product in your hands first, or place the bottle in warm water so that it feels most comfortable for your baby. Ideal for sensitive skin.

Nature always thinks sustainably – even when washing your hands:
The bi good soap powder cleans gently but thoroughly – and smells wonderfully of almond blossom and coconut. With each refill sachet, you save a plastic bottle and, due to the lower weight, CO2 emissions during transport. Of course, this makes it easy to reduce waste.

Usage
1. Pour 180ml of warm water into a bottle

3. Shake vigorously for 1 minute immediately 
4. Let it rest for 15 minutes 
5. Shake vigorously again 
The soap is ready for use after several hours at rest or overnight 

Instructions: Keep out of reach of children. Do not bring dry product into contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Not suitable for consumption. Do not use in concentrated/undiluted form or inhale. product_description: Stretch Marks Balm is a 100% natural product, waterless, with 100% active principle on skin. Stretch Marks Balm is a blend of natural extracts and beeswax that encourages the elasticity of the epidermis and minimizes stretch marks. Reduces the appearance of stretch marks. Tones and firms skin. Prevents chafing. Improves skin elasticity. It is effective for treating cellulite and skin scars and helping regenerate the skin. It is used to reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation as well. Additionally, it is quickly absorbed by the skin and regenerates internal and external epidermal tissues.
usage: Apply the balm in the morning to damp skin in circular motions, concentrating on areas of concern. Stretch marks can be minimized with consistent self-care, which includes massage. Massage increases blood circulation. An increased blood supply to tissues translates into better delivery of nutrients and elimination of waste products. Therefore, stretch marks may be less noticeable as a result of this promotion of tissue growth. Suitable for all ages, teenagers included.

name: EXTRA FINE GREEN CLAY
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Montmorillonite, Illite, Kaolin.
     * From controlled organic farming.
product_description:
Treat yourself to a dose of deep skin cleansing with French green clay. 

Since ancient times, clays have been widely and versatilely used for their detoxifying and cleansing effects. French green clay is especially suitable for oily and combination skin, which can tolerate a greater degree of dryness. Use it, for example, as a face mask, cleansing emulsion, peeling or hair shampoo. It cleans the skin perfectly, detoxifies and helps prevent clogged pores. 

Green clay is a mineral obtained from the Montmorillon region of France. It naturally contains calcium, magnesium, potassium and other minerals beneficial for beautiful skin.

name: EXTRA FINE ROSE CLAY
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Montmorillonite, Illite, Kaolin.
     * From controlled organic farming.
product_description:
Pink clay is the softest of all clays. It has many uses in the care of the skin, hair and skin of the whole body. Thanks to its fine structure, it is especially suitable for mature and sensitive skin, which does not irritate or dry out unnecessarily. It can also deal with dead skin cells that it removes. The pink clay mask deeply cleanses, detoxifies and regenerates the skin.

Clay, which has been widely used since ancient times, contains substances and minerals that are beneficial for the skin, such as iron oxide or potassium. The pink clay comes from the volcanic landscape of the Auvergne region of France, from pure nature close to nature reserves. Therefore, its composition is very clean and gentle.

Soothing Bio Lavender extracts extracted into caring Bio oils relieve irritation and redness and relieve itching and swelling. Epsom salts containing sulfur and magnesium relieve tension, Himalayan pink salt regenerates stiff muscles and joints, and Dead Sea salt promotes blood circulation in the skin. Solid facial cleansing daisy & castor oil

 - high-quality organic vegetable oils provide long-lasting care
 - Certified natural cosmetics according to NATRUE & Vegan
 - FSC-certified cardboard made from 100% recycled material

For gentle cleansing, nature has captured everything here: bi good Solid Facial Cleansing Daisy cleanses the skin and pampers it with valuable ingredients.

High-quality organic vegetable oils provide long-lasting care, while the daisy extract delicately caresses the skin. That's when nature foams at the mouth – but with joy.

Usage
Hold solid facial cleanser briefly under running water and lather between your hands. Spread the desired amount of foam over the face, avoiding the eye area. Then rinse thoroughly with water. Allow to dry after use.

Note: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Keep out of reach of children. Not suitable for consumption. Do not use on irritated skin.

product_description:
Gentle cleansing care that begins to moisturise, soften and pamper the skin while you shower.
This creamy body wash is based on a plant-based cleansing base that gently cleanses the skin while carefully protecting it from drying out. After showering, the skin is soothed, relaxed and soft. The formulation of the body wash has been imbued with the fresh scent of Litsea cubeba, which provides additional freshness for the body and mind.

Its nourishing formulation combines gentle care and relaxing freshness. It does not contain sulphates, instead it cleanses the skin with the help of a gentle plant base that does not dry it out. The formulation of the body wash combines the powers of hemp oil and grape seed oil, which together further strengthen the hydrolipidic layer of the epidermis and lead the skin to silky softness and comfort.

The luxurious creamy texture of the body wash soothes and softens the skin and provides a feeling of relaxation. The 100% natural fragrance of litsea cubeba gives the showering ritual a sense of lightness, which provides a feeling of relaxation and freshness.
usage:
Apply to wet skin, lather gently then rinse thoroughly.
Store in a dark and dry place at room temperature.
- Tip #1: Add a few drops of water to the body wash to create a gentle foamy texture.
- Tip #2: Body wash is also suitable as a base for shaving.
- Tip #3: Continue your skincare with the application of Pristine Forest Body Lotion.

product_description:
Organic Purifying Soothing Mask

Skin with imperfections or a dull complexion is often weakened and unbalanced. It's important to offer a purifying treatment while taking great care not to dry out or unbalance the skin.

This organic solid mask is therefore dedicated to the care of blemished skin. We guarantee its purifying and soothing action and a return to healthy skin. Here are the results of tests carried out on an independent panel
PURIFYING EFFECT: 95%
90% SOOTHING EFFECT
95% BALANCING EFFECT

REDUCTION OF IMPERFECTIONS: 95% - REDUCTION OF BLACKHEADS: 81
REDUCTION IN BLACKHEADS: 81
usage:
Cut off 5g of the organic solid mask (i.e. 1/6th). Place in a bowl and add 10ml warm water (about 2 teaspoons). Using a wooden pestle (or, failing that, the back of a spoon), mix until the product forms a homogeneous paste. Apply to face and neck in a semi-thick layer. Leave on for 10 minutes, then rinse off. Avoid the eye contour area.
What's more, the skin is more supple and the complexion more radiant!  The solid mask is also an ecological and economical format. A 30g solid pebble contains approximately 90g of product.

The fragrance-free sunscreen especially for baby skin has a high sun protection factor of 50 to protect the sensitive and not yet fully developed skin of babies and children from UV radiation. With purely mineral sun protection filters and without the addition of dyes, preservatives, nanoparticles, parabens and questionable substances, baybies sunscreen is particularly suitable for sensitive baby skin. The baybies sunscreen also protects coral reefs and waters and is therefore compliant with the Hawaii Reef Act.

✓ SPF 50 - high - protects against UVA and UVB rays
✓ Effectively protects against the sun's rays and moisturizes the skin
✓ Mineral light protection filter, therefore coral-friendly according to the Hawaii Reef Act
✓ Particularly suitable for very sensitive baby skin
✓ Waterproof
✓ Certified natural cosmetics (NATRUE)
✓ No added perfumes or fragrances
✓ Vegan and sustainable
✓ Skin compatibility dermatologically tested
usage:
Before sunbathing for the first time, apply generously and repeatedly. Avoid intense midday sun. In order to maintain sun protection, it is necessary to reapply cream regularly, especially after being in the water. Low application quantities reduce the protection performance.

Use protective clothing for babies and toddlers as well as sunscreen with a high sun protection factor. Even sunscreen with a high sun protection factor does not provide complete protection against UV rays.

name: JUST-ADD-WATER UNSCENTED SPRAY
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients: Potassium alum
product_description:
Happy Earth "Just add water" deodorant is a pure sustainable deodorant and the cheapest deodorant in use. The deodorant contains only one ingredient: pieces of pure alum stone. You can fill the bottle yourself with water, which activates the effect of the alum stone and you are naturally protected against body odor for a long time. In addition, the bottle can be refilled up to 6 times! This reduces the use of plastic and saves waste. You also prevent the unnecessary transport of water and the resulting CO2 emissions!  
This deodorant is odorless and hypoallergenic. We also proudly carry the NATRUE, Vegan Society and Zero Plastic Inside quality marks. With this deodorant you take good care of yourself and our planet!

A deo spray to make you happy:

-    100% natural, 100% effective and contains 0% chemicals
-    Vegan and not tested on animals
-    Provides protection for 24 hours
-    Contains only 1 ingredient: natural alum stone
-    Odorless and hypoallergenic
-    Extra durable: this bottle can be refilled up to 6 times! So less plastic, waste and cheaper to use.
-    Bottle made from recycled plastic
-    Contains 0% aluminum chlorohydrate and no chemicals, alcohol, parabens, propellants, triclosan and mineral oils
-    Proud bearer of the NATRUE, Vegan Society and Zero Plastic Inside quality marks (guaranteed microplastic-free)
-    Locally produced in the Netherlands with green energy
usage: Fill the bottle with water, shake and use immediately. When applied, it leaves a microscopic layer on the skin. This layer contains alum: a mineral salt that kills bacteria without blocking or narrowing the pores. Your body has to get used to the fact that you no longer use chemicals, but alum stone on your skin. After a week, our deodorant therefore works optimally and you naturally keep smelling fresh all day long! The bottle is refillable up to 6 times!

product_description:
Complexion enhancing, mineral anti-aging sun protection with multi-active Artemisia C-08UC Complex®, tinted

 - Highly effective, physical sun care for the daily application (SPF 30, PA+++, blue filter)
 - Developed for the highest standards of sensitive skin
 - Ensures an even complexion thanks to the discreet makeup effect, reflects sunlight and conceals irregular pigmentation, redness, fine lines and wrinkles
 - Characterized by a particularly pleasant dry-touch-texture
 - Suitable for all skin types – even for sensitive skin

certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Helianthus Annuus Hybrid Oil*, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Decyl Cocoate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Fragrance (Parfum)**, Michelia Alba Flower Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract*, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract*, Tocopherol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Lecithin, Linalool**, Limonene**, Benzyl Salicylate**, Citronellol**, Geraniol**, Citral**.
     * of controlled biological cultivation 
   ** from natural essential oils
product_description:
The indulgent body oil has a moisturizing effect, nourishes even stressed skin and has a lovely light fragrance.

With the lavera body oils, we want to inspire you to pamper yourself. Designed for little moments of wellness and sustainable care rituals. Soothing. Fragrant. Relaxing. And packed full of natural active ingredients. For your senses, your soul, and your skin.

  - Beautiful light fragrance & light texture that is quickly absorbed
  - Deeply nourishing formula with organic almond oil and magnolia blossoms
  - Supports the skin's natural ability to regenerate
  - Moisture-preserving for a lasting supple skin feeling
  - Certification according to the rigorous independent NATRUE natural cosmetics standard; dermatologically tested; vegan & certified according to PETA criteria
usage:
Apply thinly and massage gently into damp skin.
The body oil can be mixed with all our body lotions. For very dry skin, just add a few drops of oil to the lavera lotion of your choice.
Store away from heat and light.

name: WASCHSTÜCK MIT ALOE VERA UND JOHANNISKRAUTEXTRAKT
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate , Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter* **, Aqua, Sodium Chloride, Rhus Verniciflua Cera* **, Sodium Cocoate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil* **, Sodium Cocoyl Alaninate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil* ** Persea Gratissima Oil* **, Cannbis Sativa Seed Oil* **, Hypericum Perforatum Flower/Twig Extract*, Aloe Vera Leaf Powder*, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopherol*
     * From controlled organic cultivation
   ** Cold-pressed
product_description:
Facial cleansing and care in one: The wash bar with aloe vera and St. John's wort extract soothes and nourishes during daily facial cleansing.

  - Suitable for sensitive skin.
  - Vegan, cruelty-free NATRUE organic natural cosmetics
  - 100% plastic-free
  - Handmade in Darmstadt

Aloe vera has a cooling and hydrating effect, St. John's wort extract has an anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory effect. It helps to regulate the water balance of the skin and is particularly suitable for sensitive, irritated
skin. Magnolia bark extract has an anti-inflammatory effect, has a highly effective anti-aging effect and is highly antioxidant.
usage:
Can be used for daily facial cleansing or as a make-up removal aid for a make-up remover wipe.
Lather the soap-free wash bar in your hands and spread it over your face. Alternatively, sweep the entire wash over the moistened face. Lather with your hands and spread over the skin. Then wash off with lukewarm water.

Leaves the skin cleansed and moisturized. If necessary, then provide further care, with day or night care.

product_description:
- Pro Climate – Acting in an environmentally neutral way
 - Vegan Solid Shampoo
 - With a wonderful tangerine-basil scent
 - Cleans thoroughly
 - Without silicones and parabens

The alverde NATURKOSMETIK Solid Shampoo Mandarin-Basil cleanses the hair thoroughly without weighing it down and also gives a pleasant hair feeling. In addition, the vegan shampoo bar is particularly gentle on the hair and scalp. The solid hair shampoo is free of silicones and parabens. Not only the hair, but also the senses are pampered, because the wonderful scent of tangerine basil takes your thoughts on a fruity-spicy journey and turns every shower into a short holiday. Formulation without microplastics and water-soluble purely synthetic polymers.

certification_description: At least 95% of natural and/or derived natural ingredients, where applicable, stem from organic agriculture or controlled harvesting of wild plants.

Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis leaf extract*, Prunus Amygdalus dulcis oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Titanium Dioxide, Olea Europaea fruit extract*, Coco-Caprylate, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Lavandula Angustifolia flower extract*, Butyrospermum Parkii butter*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Silica, Jojoba Esters, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dicaprylyl Ether, Tocopherol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Algin, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Citric Acid, Mica, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Limonene, Linalool.

product_description:
AntiAge & Moisture cream - SPF15, Organic & Vegan, With Almond, Olive & SheaButter
Intense Anti-Age, lots of moisture and protection against both UVA & UVB rays.

product_description:
Perfume-free Essabó is an eco-bath soap that is free of allergens from perfumes or essences. Its base is made with sustainably farmed coconut oil and olive oil from Spanish bio-crops.

It is handcrafted by traditional cold saponification.

Allergen-free, especially for children and people with sensitive or atopic skins, and are allergic to or cannot tolerate allergens from perfumes and essential oils.
usage:
- A bar of Essabó soap is the most natural product for body cleanliness and hygiene. It makes plenty of creamy lather that cleans, nourishes and cares for your skin’s health. It does not cause irritations, hypersensitivity or itchiness when coming into direct contact with the synthetic ingredients usually found in gels and shampoos.
 - Essabó soaps clean all skin types thoroughly, conveniently and healthily by removing impurities, and even make-up.
 - Correct hand hygiene is essential to prevent infection and/or contagion. Traditional “all-time” soap is the most efficient natural product to remove dirt, while caring for the most delicate skin and hands.
 - It is also highly recommended to supplement any aesthetic treatment as good skin cleaning is an essential previous step to more efficiently perform any treatment. Essabó thoroughly cleans skin and makes it more receptive to cosmetics used later as part of face and body treatments.

product_description:
A gentle massage is something very natural and a wonderful way to give your child safety and security. If you regularly massage with baby scented body oil before going to bed, the body will adjust to relaxation through the smell. As a side effect, the touch and the ingredients strengthen your child's self-confidence and defenses.

 - with organic almond and calendula oil, mimosa, rose, chamomile and lavender
 - novel formulation has a relaxing effect and helps to fall asleep
 - regenerates and cares for delicate baby and children's skin thanks to valuable rose oil
 - has a calming effect on irritations such as mosquito bites, rashes and redness
 - helps with stomach ache and colic thanks to valuable roman chamomile
usage:
Before going to bed or whenever relaxation is desired, warm the Sweet Dreams body oil in your hands and apply to the entire body, massaging gently. Ideal also for an abdominal massage. Thanks to roman chamomile, the oil has a strong antispasmodic effect and helps with colic and abdominal pain.

Massage tip: it is important to massage the abdomen always in a clockwise direction to stimulate digestion. Massage with light pressure around the belly button and stroke out in the direction of the right (from above) thigh.

product_description:
The gentle water for babies and children combines three floral waters in Bio quality. They are matched to each other to provide the delicate and sensitive skin of the little ones with the care they need. Bio floral water also offers a harmonizing care for dry and problematic skin.

Bio Rose Water has moisturizing and regenerating effects. Its smell resembles the womb of the mother.

Bio Lavender Water soothes reddened and irritated skin. Since time immemorial, its fragrance has been attributed to the power to calm a distracted mind and induce a restful sleep.

Bio Chamomile water has a delicate honey aroma and soothing effects. Relieves nappy rash, itching and swelling.
usage:
Body care: Bio Floral Water is created for daily baby care. When changing diapers, first treat the washed skin with Bio Floral Water for Babies. Then apply PURITY VISION® Bio Baby Body Butter. Concentrate on spreading the butter in the area of the folds of the skin to avoid nappy rash and irritation. This combination will keep your baby's skin nourished and protected. To enhance the effect of hydration, we recommend applying butter to moistened skin. In the evening, add Bio Floral Water to the bath, 10 splashes per 1 l bath, along with a teaspoon of Bio Baby Body Butter PURITY VISION®. You can start this daily care from the birth of your baby.

Pampering the skin: Mothers like it as a lotion and tonic. You do not have to worry about treating dry, inflammatory, eczematic or irritated skin. After application, the skin and skin will be beautifully soft and hydrated. We also recommend using it as a base before applying our facial oils. This step will lead to easier absorption and the oil will work better. During hot days, you can use Bio Floral Water to quickly refresh your face.

Fragrant hairs: Bio Floral Water will help with combing the first curls and restless hair of older children. After application, all curls will be silky and beautifully fragrant. Because Bio Floral Water has great moisturizing and regenerating effects, you can spray it directly to the roots. Not only will you help their natural growth, but you can also gently remove the scaly cuticle.

name: PURIFYING MOISTURISING MASK - MAN
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
product_description:
Ingrédients
Aqua, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Butyrospermium Parkii Butter, Glycerin, Rosa Moschata Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Bulbine Frutescens Leaf Juice, Tocopherol, Aronia Melanocarpa Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Ectoin, Hydroxyectoin, Glyceryl Stearate, Octyldodecanol, Sodium Levulinate, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Anisate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Benzoate, Xylose, Citric Acid, Octyldodecyl Xyloside, Parfum

Main ingredients
Ectoine, Bulbine frutescens, Shea Butter, Tocopherol, Black Chokeberry Extract.

Description
This mask contains natural plant extracts to exfoliate, purify and protect the skin from pollution. The nourishing plant oils restore the skin’s radiance, leaving it thoroughly moisturised.

-    Purifies and regenerates the dermis
-    Helps prevent the skin becoming dehydrated
-    Protects against blue light and pollution
-    Nourishes and firms
-    Soothes irritated skin

Usage
This mask has a fine texture, which is applied like a cream, and can be used at any time of day. You can leave it on for as long as you want and it can be used by itself or combined with another essential.

After cleansing your skin, use your fingertips to take one application of cream. Warm the cream between your fingers and apply it to your face and neck using small circular motions.

Next, spread the serum using upward strokes to prevent sagging skin. On your forehead, stroke sideways towards the temples.

product_description:
Based on the trio of honey beeswax propolis, all in organic bud quality. These have an anti-inflammatory, skin-caring and protective effect (confirmed in international publications on apitherapy).

Complementary ingredients include vitamin E, high-quality shea butter, sunflower oil, almond oil and an extract of calendula (calendula blossoms). Marigolds are a proven remedy for the treatment of various skin ailments such as abrasions, reddened or inflamed areas and especially supports skin health.
The balm is also suitable for heavily stressed areas and makes them soft and resistant. The beeswax forms a protective layer.

Without a water phase, this formulation does not require any preservatives.

Aroma/Parfum: a few drops of essential oils (lemon, orange) refreshing, clear (aroma theory: invigorating, uplifting)
usage: The firm texture of the balm becomes supple on warm skin and is preferably lightly massaged in. It is designed to be greasy and therefore perfect for applying and leaving on several times a day (great overnight).

name: PROPOLIS TINKTUR
certification_description: At least 95% of natural and/or derived natural ingredients, where applicable, stem from organic agriculture or controlled harvesting of wild plants.
ingredients: Alcohol, Aqua, Propolis cera.
product_description:
Pure organic propolis tincture for external and internal use.

Due to direct extraction, optimal transfer of propolis properties.

Basically, for a tincture, a substance is prepared in alcohol and dissolved. Since propolis in its original form is firstly very intense and secondly resinous-sticky and yellowish in colour, the preparation of a tincture for further use is just too suitable.

In order to extract the numerous ingredients from the raw propolis, we use a slightly diluted medicinal alcohol 96%. This is so pure that it can be used externally and internally and preserves itself for years due to the high alcohol content.
usage:
- Undiluted with e.g. a cotton swab: for sore spots in the mouth, cold sores, warts, insect bites 
Caution: use carefully (alcohol can also burn a little!)

 - Diluted: 
   - Externally: for poultices for poorly healing wounds, washes
   - Internally: add a few drops to a teaspoon of water/tea/milk (gives a whitish cloudiness due to the resin content) for gargling in case of a sore throat or daily drinking to strengthen the immune system.

name: CALENDULA PEELING
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Sucrose, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil*, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil*, Aqua (Water), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil, Sucrose Laurate, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil*, Calendula Officinalis Flower, Sucrose Stearate, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract*, Sucrose Palmitate.
     * From organic farming.

product_description: Bio Caring Calendula Scrub PURITY VISION® will love your whole body, including your face and lips. Treat yourself to care in the form of a delicate gel-like peeling with an enchanting scent of orange and calendula. Calendula peeling contains purely natural ingredients that remove dead cells and make the skin smooth to the touch. At the same time, the pores are cleansed, blood circulation and the skin firms. The result is beautifully soft and radiant skin.
usage:
Body care: Bio Caring Calendula Scrub provides perfect and gentle care to the whole body from head to toe. Massage the peeling into the skin in a circular motion to effectively improve blood circulation and warm up the skin. Do not forget about the feet, which definitely deserve care after a hard day. Leave the scrub on for about 5 minutes and then rinse with warm water.
Thanks to the large representation of sugar crystals, the dead cells are effectively but also gently abraded. Peeling serves as a great prevention against cellulite, leaving the skin smooth and soft to the touch.
TIP: Regular peeling foot massage will significantly soften and refine.

Facial massage peeling: Calendula and sea buckthorn extract combined with vitamin-rich oils will provide your skin with the best care. The peeling effectively cleanses pores and gives the skin exceptional softness after the first application. Apply the scrub to a moistened face and massage in in a circular motion. After 5 minutes, rinse and enjoy the beautiful radiant skin with the scent of oranges.
TIP: Try a scrub in combination with our Bio Floral Waters for even more radiant skin.

Soft lips in seconds: Treat your lips to this sweet care too. Apply a little scrub to your finger and massage your lips with it. Sugar crystals take care of the removal of dead cells. The combination of oils gives the lips hydration and regeneration. The result is soft, perfused and nourished lips.
TIP: When applying lip scrub, you don't have to be afraid to taste a little, our calendula scrub is really irresistibly sweet.

product_description:
Our STUDIO BOTANIC COLD CREAM (50 ml alu tube) is a real all-rounder: depending on what you require, you can use it for body and hands and also face. While the oils add extra moisture, smooth fine lines and combat inflammation, the vegan wax increases the skin’s natural protective function.

The carefully selected and well-dosed rose flower extract not only exudes a delicate, warm fragrance, but also has a calming, balancing and regenerating effect. In combination with the freshness of the peppermint oil creates the particularly delicate scent of the cream, which keeps in the background after application. In its pure naturalness the original scent reduces over time.

The effects of cold cream – also called “cerat de galien”- have been proven over hundreds of years, because it was not (unfortunately) invented by us, but by the Greek doctor Galenos. In the second century BC. Even then, the intense cold cream, originally composed of water, beeswax, olive oil and rose extract, was used to soothe dry hands.
usage:
You can apply the STUDIO BOTANIC COLD CREAM on both your body and hands.

To become fully effective it is best to apply the cream on cleansed skin and massage thoroughly. 

A hazelnut-sized amount (approx. 1 ml) of the cream is sufficient for the hands.
 
Please do not store in an overheated place and note that the natural ingredients are most productive within 6 months of opening.

product_description:
The new SALZQUELL face serum has a wonderfully light texture, absorbs quickly and leaves no residue on the skin - ideal as a base under your make-up or as a smooth addition to your daily skincare routine. Thanks to the powerful formula of high-quality, natural ingredients, even a small amount is enough to pamper your skin with an extra portion of care.

The combination of apple stem cell extract, raspberry seed oil, brine, hyaluronic acid and magnolia extract can optimally moisturize your skin while improving skin elasticity and refining the complexion. The contained apple stem cell extract is obtained from a rare Swiss apple variety and is a real insider tip in skin care. It can not only stimulate skin renewal, but also promote the longevity of skin cells. Magnolia has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for a long time and its extract is said to have a variety of anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties. The recipe is rounded off by the high-quality raspberry seed oil. Thanks to its high content of vitamin C, potassium and fruit acid, raspberry has been considered a medicinal plant since ancient times and can protect your cells from oxidative stress.

This hand cream has been specifically developed for sensitive and dry skin. It contains aloe vera, shea butter and organic almond oil that help hydrate and care for the skin in a natural way. The cream has a wonderful, allergen-free perfume that smells lights of almond and peach. This product, like all other Happy Earth products, is 100% microplastic-free. The packaging is a 100% biobased tube made from sugar cane and Happy Earth is produced in the Netherlands with green energy.

name: DAY CREAM BLUELIGHT DEFENCE MOISTURISER
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients: Aqua, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Cetearyl Wheat Straw Glycosides, Coco Caprylate, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Gluconolactone (and) Cyathea Medullaris (Mamaku) Leaf extract (and) Water (and) Sodium Benzoate (and) Algae extract (and) Potassium Sorbate (and) Calcium Gluconate, Water (and) Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract (and) Glycerin, Water (and) Benzyl Alcohol, Tridecane (and) Undecane, Heptyl Undecylenate, Fragrance (Natural), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Saccharide Isomerate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Natural Fragrance.
product_description:
Protect your skin from blue light damage with our vegan and 100% natural high-performance moisturizer. Enriched with vitamins and antioxidants, it provides a protective shield while nourishing your skin. Its fast-absorbing formula makes it an ideal base for makeup. Suitable for all skin types, it rejuvenates and revives your complexion, revealing a natural glow. Experience the benefits of advanced blue light protection and age-defying properties in one powerful moisturizer.

Protection: Natural superstars like Kakadu Plum and Algae extract work together to protect your skin from
blue light damage. Check out the tab to the right for more info on how blue light affects your skin.

Moisturising: Hydrating ingredients like sweet almond oil, aloe vera juice, and mamaku leaf extract attracts
moisture from the environment and help retain it in the skin. It forms a protective barrier, preventing water
loss and improving dry and flaky skin, leaving it soft and supple.

Nourishing: Rich in essential fatty acids, including oleic acid and linoleic acid, vitamins, minerals, and trace
elements that help to revitalize the skin, promote cell regeneration, and improve overall skin health.

Anti-aging: The potent antioxidants, such as vitamins A, E, and B-complex, as well as phenolic compounds
help neutralize free radicals, which are responsible for aging and skin damage. Regular use helps minimize
the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and age spots, promoting a more youthful-looking complexion.

Collagen production: Containing triterpenes, found in shea butter, and vitamin E, as well as Mamaku extract, which protect and promote collagen synthesis, improving skin tone and elasticity.

Non-Comedogenic: With a lightweight texture that doesn’t clog pores, it moisturises all skin types without
contributing to the formation of acne or blackheads or leaving a greasy residue.

Barrier Repair: The protective barrier formed by glycerin on the skin’s surface can enhance its natural
defense mechanisms. It helps strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier, which is essential for protecting against
environmental stressors, pollutants, and irritants. A stronger barrier function promotes healthier and more
resilient skin.

Acne Treatment: The antimicrobial, antibacterial, and antifungal properties help to inhibit the growth of
acne-causing bacteria, control excess oil production, reduce inflammation, and minimize the appearance of
acne scars.

name: POWER SERUM
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Melissa Officinalis Flower/Leaf/ Stem Water*, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Water*, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil*, Salix Nigra Bark Extract, Aqua, Glycerin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Xanthan Gum (natural binder), Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate (emulsifier), Zinc PCA, Echinacea Purpurea Extract (Echinacea Extract), Azadirachta Indica Leaf Extract (Neem Extract), Nigella Sativa Seed Oil (Kalonji Oil), Melissa Officinalis Leaf Oil (Lemon Balm Essential Oil), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder (Green Tea Extract), Tapioca Starch (Cassava Starch), Algin (Seaweed Extract), Citral**.

   ** A natural ingredient in lemon balm water and essential oil.
product_description:
Reduction of clogged pores and sebum production, soothing irritated skin with 1% salicylic acid and 0.5% zinc. Bio Power serum is an ideal helper for clogged pores and the reduction of excessive sebum. The unique combination of willow bark extract (salicylic acid) and PCA zinc helps reduce excess oil and redness. Echinacea extract together with Bio Aloe vera juice harmonizes and soothes reddened skin and supports natural skin regeneration, including scars. Leaves pores clean & skin soft & hydrated The silky gentle serum will fall in love not only with problematic skin.

The serum has a unique natural formula that will make your skin smooth and free of excess sebum. Soothing ingredients help against redness and help the skin regenerate.

Harmonizing aroma with hints of lemon balm and matcha tea will provide a feeling of freshness at any time of the day.

In addition, the serum has a light consistency that is quickly absorbed, does not leave a greasy film and ensures a long-lasting feeling of velvety softness.
usage:
Apply a few drops of the serum morning and/or evening to cleansed and toned skin, then massage in facial oil or PURITY VISION cream. When applying, avoid the area around the eyes. You can also use the serum to treat pimples topically. Recommended to be combined with other PURITY VISION seers for a more intense effect. When combining PURITY VISION serums, allow the serum to absorb for a few minutes and then apply another serum. It is ideal to start with a smaller amount of serums and then increase the intensity of use. When combined with BIO Retinol serum, apply at least a day apart.
TIP: For a cooling effect, store the serum in the refrigerator

product_description:
* 100% natural and vegan ingredients
* For a sillky soft skin Voor een zijdezachte huid
* Cares, hydrates and absorbs quicky
* With shea butter and organic almond oil
* No microplastics or other chemicals
* Wonderful  natural scent, allergen-free
* Tube made from sugar cane

The purest and most sustainable care for your skin and for the earth. Happy Earth Pure Body Lotion is 100% natural, 100% caring, without chemicals and allergen-free.

Happy Earth Pure Body Lotion is a 100% natural, vegan body lotion made from ingredients that make your skin and the earth happy. All ingredients in the body lotion are certified 100% natural and have the Natrue and Vegan Society quality marks. In addition, this body lotion obviously contains no chemicals, so you can be sure that you are not applying harmful produts to your skin. 

This soft body lotion has been specifically developed for sensitive and dry skin. It contains organic almond oil and shea butter that help hydrate and care for the skin in a natural way. The body lotion has a wonderful, allergen-free perfume that smells lights of almond and peach. This product, like all other Happy Earth products, is 100% microplastic-free. The packaging is a 100% biobased tube made from sugar cane and Happy Earth is produced in the Netherlands with green energy.

name: SHOWER POWDER DRY SKIN EUCALYPTUS CITRUS
certification_description: Strict rules for naturalness apply. The natural ingredients are not necessarily from organic cultivation.
product_description:
Description
This all-natural, plastic-free, refillable body wash for dry skin is infused with plant-based active ingredients that work together to leave your skin feeling soft, fresh and clean. Plus, it’s naturally-scented, 100% vegan and cruelty-free! It is perfect for all of you who want to stop using products that contain harmful chemicals and plastics. You can now feel good about how you treat yourself! 

 - SMART -  Up to 95% of a shower gel you buy is WATER - something, that already comes from your tap. With ETHOSA, you only spend on highly efficient, NATURAL ingredients that support your individual SKIN NEEDS.
 - SOPHISTICATED -  A stylish REFILLABLE solution that elevates your bathroom game. No more plastic. No more mushy soap bars. But pride & elegance, and a HEALTHIER planet.
 - POW(D)ER TO THE PEOPLE - Body care that’s led by people’s needs, sense and purpose.

Usage
 1 - Pour the shower powder sachet into the refillable bottle.
2 - Add 350ml of lukewarm water.
3 - Give it a good shake and it’s ready to use!
